name: @project-sunbird/discussion-service
description: Form service API for project sunbird. It helps to manage form configuration based on channel, type, subtype, component.

scripts.build-dev: npm run clean-dist-dev &&  npm run compile-dev && npm run copy-package-dev && npm run copy-db-dev && npm run resolve-dev-dependencies
scripts.build-prod: node_modules/.bin/rimraf ./dist && tsc --noImplicitUseStrict && node_modules/.bin/cpy package.json ./dist && node_modules/.bin/cpy db/* ./dist/db
scripts.test: echo 'go to '../test' folder to execute test cases!'
